description:
Animation Video Maker


Tool: Optimize the formula window interface to improve user experience.
Text: Optimize the text material classification and display to improve user experience.
Operation: Optimize the canvas operation experience, distinguish canvas and assets operations on the left and right sides of the top.
Favorites:Optimize the favorites panel feature to support adding local materials.
Animation: Optimize the advanced settings of gesture animation, and support setting the pen point position at any time.Animation: Optimize the anchor point edit feature, and advanced settings of some animation effects.
Subtitles: Support one-click deletion of subtitles in all scenes.
Operation: Support splitting folders.
Property: Paper cut effect supports edting thickness.
Materials: Add basic settings for special effect and foreground like adjusting opacity and position.
My scene: Add manager group feature to support custom classification, renaming scenes and other related operations.
STT: Optimize the recognition process, add speech recognition confirmation, and support viewing and application of previous speech recognition records.
Interface: Fixed the issue where some buttons exceeding the container and displaying wrong names.
Others: Known bugs fixed.
